data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 25,233 believers in Purbi Singhbhum against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary: On average, 186 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Purbi Singhbhum to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Lord, remember the Angarok people. Make the Angarok people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, help the 25,233 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,268,667 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Purbi Singhbhum words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the county of Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India has a population of 2,293,900.

We estimate Purbi Singhbhum has 25,233 people who might know Jesus, 27,833 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,240,834 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Purbi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
